secondScreens.title: Device retrieval & redeployment services
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Collect devices from global offices, remote teams, and warehouse locations.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Scan, sanitize, and transport each asset with full chain-of-custody visibility.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Refurbish and redeploy hardware with updated images and documentation.

secondScreens.title: IT asset disposition (ITAD) for end-user devices
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Grade devices, document condition, and separate reusable components.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Perform certified data sanitization tailored to compliance requirements.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Remarket or recycle assets to maximize value recovery and sustainability.

secondScreens.title: Data center decommissioning & ITAD
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Coordinate disconnects, labeling, and physical extraction of racks and gear.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Destroy media on-site or in secure Iron Mountain facilities with auditable proof.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Process, resell, or recycle equipment to clear the space and capture value.

secondScreens.title: Decommissioning and logistics
secondScreens.stepOneDescription: Plan the logistics timeline, crate equipment, and schedule secure transport.
secondScreens.stepTwoDescription: Provide detailed chain-of-custody records, insurance, and compliance reporting.
secondScreens.stepThreeDescription: Deliver assets to lifecycle facilities for reuse, redeployment, or disposal.
